name: Acme Biologics
description: Full-service biologics contract manufacturer with GMP-certified cleanrooms and sterile fill/finish capability. Strong in clinical-to-commercial scale-up.

name: BioGenix Solutions
description: Analytical testing lab and stability studies provider with broad experience in vaccine analytics and release testing.

name: PharmaPro Partners
description: CDMO specializing in commercial packaging and serialization across multiple global markets. Competitive pricing for large volumes.

name: SterilePack Inc.
description: Sterile manufacturing with strong cold-chain packaging options; experienced in injectable fill/finish and lyophilization.

name: GlobalTest Labs
description: Independent lab network providing analytical services, method development, and stability protocols for regulatory submissions.

name: MedPack Services
description: Contract packager focused on commercial packaging, kitting, and secondary packaging for specialty pharma and biologics.

name: NextGen Pharma
description: Flexible CDMO offering small-batch clinical manufacturing through to commercial licensing support; good for complex modalities.

name: Vaxel Manufacturing
description: High-throughput vaccine production and global distribution experience; support for serialization and cold chain logistics.

name: EuroPharm Logistics
description: Packaging and serialization specialist with strong European regulatory experience and multi-country supply chain capabilities.

name: Precision Analytics
description: Analytical and testing specialists focusing on biologics characterization, high-sensitivity assays and method transfers.
